Description: For sale is my Ibanez RGIT20FE 6-string neck-thru-body guitar. I purchased this about a year ago and it is in excellent condition. This thing plays great, the neck is super thin and fast, and those EMGs roar, as you'd expect. The wood is beautiful. A great piece - I'm just downsizing a bit.. One minor flaw is a hairline crack near the kill switch (see picture). The wood is thinner there because of the battery space. You have to look pretty hard to see it... I have had this looked at by my luthier and he said it is stable and so small that its not worth fixing at this point. See pictures... Auction comes with:Ibanez RGIT20FEPack of unopened D'addario EXL110 stringsBrand new Union Station gig bag (bought just to use for this auction) This guitar comes from my smoke-free studio where all gear is treated with the utmost care. All electronics and hardware work great, it is super clean, and as good as you will get used. Buyer pays actual shipping costs. I do not charge any additional handling fees or anything like that. I ship USPS Priority and ship within 24 hours of receiving your payment, usually the same day. Please see my feedback for excellent comments left by buyers of other pieces of gear from my studio. Thanks or looking! Title: Ibanez Iron label RGIT20FE ~ Natural ~ 6 String Guitar ~ USED Free Shipping
